title: @SmartEdTech
text: Building the education of the XXI century by addressing public, social and economic issues.

title: @SmartEdTech
text:
Welcome to the @SmartEdtech git community
The msc SmartEdtech master is a international master hosted by the Université Côte d’Azur in Nice France with an incredible community of hundred of students from all other the world.

title: M1 page
text: This page presents you M1 smarties.

title: Discover quarto
text:
Quarto is based on pandoc «a universal document converter» that convert between multiple formats including.

markdown
html
docx
odt
pptx
pdf via latex
and many others.

The traditionnal workflow is to use markdown source and convert it to wathever document format you want.
Advantages of markdown includes

easy to read
easy to write
descriptive and extensible to fit your use-cases.
